name: Stand-Up Comedy
event_content:
A sense of humor is the ability to laugh at one's self, to take a joke and to not be the joke.

'It's time to take a break from the seriousness of life and join us for some comic relief.'

BRAHMA'23‚ö° is excited to announce the upcoming Stand-up comedyü•≥ show and cordially invites everyone to join in on the laughter-filled fun.

Get ready to laugh until you cry as the most hilarious and talented comedians among us battle it out in an epic stand-up comedy competition.


Rules and Regulations


üî∏This is an individual event. Event is open to all.

üî∏Stand Up in Malayalam (Casual English words in between is permitted). Time limit is 7 minutes.

üî∏No participant can point out any individual,religion, caste, race or political party in any way.

üî∏Imitation of existing ideas, in-appropriate & offensive contents and dirty jokes will lead to disqualification. Usage of abusive language is strictly prohibited.

üî∏Negative marking for exceeding time limit.
